menu.ysm_utils.load_model.folder_error.d:
There are no main model files or first-person arm model files in this folder!
Please check that you have the correct model folder open!
menu.ysm_utils.add_model_info.not_open.t: No model files have been opened yet
menu.ysm_utils.add_model_info.not_open.d: Please open the model file and click the Add Information option!
menu.ysm_utils.add_model_info.format_err:
The file opened is not a Bedrock Edition model in json format!
Please export it to a Bedrock Edition model in json format and reopen it!
menu.ysm_utils.add_model_info.no_data.de:
The model was opened before the plugin was loaded, causing the data to fail to be read.
Please don't close Blockbench, just reopen the current model!
menu.ysm_utils.model_info.name: Model Name
menu.ysm_utils.model_info.desc.tip: Can write multiple lines of description text
menu.ysm_utils.model_info.author: Author
menu.ysm_utils.model_info.author.tip: Enter one author name per line
menu.ysm_utils.model_info.free.tip: After checking, the model can be switched freely even if it is thrown into the Auth folder.
menu.ysm_utils.model_info.license.cc0: Waiver of all copyrights, unrestricted redistribution, modification, commercial use
menu.ysm_utils.model_info.license.mit: Only copyright reserved, no other restrictions
menu.ysm_utils.model_info.license.cc_by_: Secondary distribution, modification, and commercial use are allowed; but signature is required
Secondary distribution and modification are allowed; commercial use is not allowed; and signature is required
Secondary distribution is allowed; modification and commercial use are not allowed; and signature is required
menu.ysm_utils.model_info.license.arr: All rights reserved and may not be freely copied
tip.ysm_utils.create_dialog.char_invalid: Model ID must be lowercase English characters or underscores
tip.ysm_utils.create_dialog.success.desc: Model folder has been successfully created at %0!
